Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Bauer Il Palazzo, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from Correr Civic Museum and minutes from St. Mark's Basilica. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Salute Waterbus and Procuratie Nuove.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a spa tub, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a spa tub, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Bauer Il Palazzo, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from Correr Civic Museum and minutes from St. Mark's Basilica. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Salute Waterbus and Procuratie Nuove.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Correr Civic Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Salute Waterbus - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Procuratie Nuove - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
La Fenice Opera House - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St. Mark's Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Santa Maria del Giglio - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Basilica of St Mary of Health - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
St Mark's Campanile - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Procuratie Vecchie - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Mark's Clocktower - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Doge's Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
National Library of St Mark's - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Punta della Dogana - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Contarini del Bovolo - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Mark's Basilica - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

The preferred airport for Bauer Il Palazzo is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 8 km / 5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text:
D7 ROOM IS A DELUXE ROOM, SUPERIOR THAN THE 2X,WHICH IS A STANDARD DELUXE D7 ROOMS ARE CALLED DELUXE PALAZZO AND THEY ARE LUXURIOUS AND QUITE. THEY OVERLOOK AN INTERNAL COURT. G2 ROOMS ARE DELUXE ROOMS THAT OVERLOOK THE SAN MOISE RIVER OR THEY HAVE DIFFERENT PANORAMIC VIEWS. THEY ARE SUPERIOR THAN THE G3 ROOM THAT ARE STANDARD DELUXE ROOMS WHICH OVERLOOK THE CITY CENTRE.// LE TIPOLOGIE DI STANZE D7 E G2 SONO CAMERE DELUXE SUPERIORI RISPETTO ALLE ALTR2X E G3 CHE SONO CAMERE DELUXE STANDARD. LE D7 DELUXE PALAZZO SONO LUSSUOSE E E TRANQUILLE, AFFACCIANO SU UNA CORTE INTERNA. LE G2 DELUXE PALAZZO CON VISTA AFFACCIANO SUL RIO SAN MOISE O HANNO UNA VISTA PANORAMICA SULLA CITTA

EXTRA BED FOR CHILDREN BETWEEN 0 AND 12 YEARS OLD ARE FOR FREE. FROM 13 YEARS OLD TO 18 YEARS OLD THE COST OF AN EXTRA BED IS OF 126,5 EURO CAMA EXTRA ES GRATUITA PARA NI¥OS HASTA LOS 12. ENTRE LOS 12 Y LOS 18 EL COSTEDE UNA CAMA EXTRA ES 126,5 EUROS IL LETTO AGGIUNTIVO PER I BAMBINI FINO AI 12 ANNI DI ETA  GRATUITO. DAI 13 AI 18 ANNI, IL COSTO DEL LETTO AGGIUNTIVO  DI 126,5 EURO

IN CASE OF NO SHOW, HOTEL RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF THESTAY / EN EL CASO DE NO SHOW EL HOTEL SE RESERVA EL DERECHO DE HACER EL CARGO DEL IMPORTE TOTAL DE LA RESERVA. / IN CASO DI NO SHOW L'HOTEL SI RISERVA IL DIRITTO DI ADDEBITARE L'INTERO IMPORTO DEL SOGGIORNO.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

ENTRE LOS 12 Y LOS 18 EL COSTEDE UNA CAMA EXTRA ES 126,5 EUROS IL LETTO AGGIUNTIVO PER I BAMBINI FINO AI 12 ANNI DI ETA  GRATUITO. DAI 13 AI 18 ANNI, IL COSTO DEL LETTO AGGIUNTIVO  DI 126,5 EURO

IN CASE OF NO SHOW, HOTEL RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF THESTAY / EN EL CASO DE NO SHOW EL HOTEL SE RESERVA EL DERECHO DE HACER EL CARGO DEL IMPORTE TOTAL DE LA RESERVA. / IN CASO DI NO SHOW L'HOTEL SI RISERVA IL DIRITTO DI ADDEBITARE L'INTERO IMPORTO DEL SOGGIORNO.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

D7 ROOM IS A DELUXE ROOM, SUPERIOR THAN THE 2X,WHICH IS A STANDARD DELUXE D7 ROOMS ARE CALLED DELUXE PALAZZO AND THEY ARE LUXURIOUS AND QUITE. THEY OVERLOOK AN INTERNAL COURT. G2 ROOMS ARE DELUXE ROOMS THAT OVERLOOK THE SAN MOISE RIVER OR THEY HAVE DIFFERENT PANORAMIC VIEWS. THEY ARE SUPERIOR THAN THE G3 ROOM THAT ARE STANDARD DELUXE ROOMS WHICH OVERLOOK THE CITY CENTRE.// LE TIPOLOGIE DI STANZE D7 E G2 SONO CAMERE DELUXE SUPERIORI RISPETTO ALLE ALTR2X E G3 CHE SONO CAMERE DELUXE STANDARD.
